The user performs a quick dash towards his opponent, slashing them.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the manga and anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3]]''.
* When Mifune performs this technique, he exclaims something which is similar to the name of the [[Iai Beheading|technique]] he used against [[Ibuse]], even though the motion of the technique is different.
* The naming of the attack in Japanese is likely a pun off of the term {{Translation|yōjinbō|用心棒|}}, which literally means "bouncer" or "bodyguard".
** The naming of the attack in Japanese is also likely a reference to the [[Wikipedia:Yojimbo|1961 Japanese samurai film]] co-written, produced, edited, and directed by Akira Kurosawa and staring Toshiro Mifune.
